title: 97: The Healthy Habits While Safe at Home Episode
itunes:title: The Healthy Habits While Safe at Home Episode
description: In today’s episode, Lisa, Mikey, and Jamie talk about what they’re doing to stay healthy! They discuss topics like how to stay active, how to stay hydrated, what they’re doing to relax, and SO MUCH MORE! Plus, Lisa debuts a brand-new HG product that will soon become part of your daily routine! What are you waiting for? (We know you have the time!) Push play now, and then head on over to our Foodcast page for more tips.
itunes:summary: Staying healthy while being “safe at home” can be a challenge, but HG is here to help!
itunes:author: Lisa Lillien
dc:creator: Lisa Lillien
